link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..449

Index entries for sequences related to Laguerre polynomials
mathematica: nmax = 23; CoefficientList[Series[Exp[-2 x/(1 - x)]/(1 - x), {x, 0, nmax}], x] Range[0, nmax]!
program: (MAGMA) [Factorial(n)*(&+[(-1)^k*Binomial(n,k)*2^k/Factorial(k): k in [0..n]]): n in [0..30]]; // _G. C. Greubel_, Feb 06 2018
